parameters.name: TemplateURL
parameters.description: The URL that is used to store the content of the Operation Orchestration Service (OOS) template in the Alibaba Cloud Object Storage Service (OSS). Only the public-read URL is supported. You can use this parameter to specify the tasks that you want to run. This way, you do not need to create a template before you start an execution. If you select an existing template, you do not need to specify this parameter.
